title: Delay due to signal fault on Circle Line

title_translations.zh-Hans: 环线信号故障导致延误
title_translations.ms: Kelewatan disebabkan oleh kegagalan isyarat di Laluan Bulat
title_translations.ta: வட்டப் பாதையில் சமிக்ஞை கோளாறு காரணமாக தாமதம்

updates.text: [CCL] UPDATE: Please use alternative means of transport to your destination. Free regular bus services are still available between #DhobyGhaut / #MarinaBay to #PayaLebar. Bridging bus services are still available between #Promenade and #PayaLebar.

[CCL] UPDATE:  No train service between #Esplanade / #Bayfront and #Mountbatten. Additional 30 minutes between #DhobyGhaut and #Esplanade, #MarinaBay and #Bayfront, and #Mountbatten and #PayaLebar. Please use alternative means of transport to continue your journey.
[CCL] UPDATE : Free regular bus services are still available between #DhobyGhaut / #MarinaBay to #PayaLebar. Bridging bus services are still available between #Promenade and #PayaLebar.
[CCL] UPDATE : No train service between #Esplanade / #Bayfront and #Mountbatten. Additional 30 minutes between #DhobyGhaut and #Esplanade, #MarinaBay and #Bayfront, and #Mountbatten and #PayaLebar.

[CCL] UPDATE : Additional 30mins train travel time between #DhobyGhaut  / #MarinaBay and #PayaLebar. Free regular bus services are available between #DhobyGhaut / #MarinaBay to #PayaLebar. Bridging bus services are available between #Promenade and #PayaLebar.

[CCL] : [Update] Additional 30mins train travel time between #DhobyGhaut  / #MarinaBay and #PayaLebar due to a signal fault. Free regular bus services are available between #DhobyGhaut / #MarinaBay to #PayaLebar. Our engineers are still looking into the fault.

[CCL] : Additional 30mins train travel time between #DhobyGhaut  / #MarinaBay and #PayaLebar due to a signal fault. Free regular bus services are available between #DhobyGhaut / #MarinaBay to #PayaLebar.
[CCL] CLEARED: Train services between #DhobyGhaut /#MarinaBay and #PayaLebar have resumed. Free regular bus & free bridging bus svcs have ceased.
[CCL] : Additional 30mins train travel time between #DhobyGhaut / #MarinaBay and #PayaLebar due to a signal fault. Free Regular Bus is available between #DhobyGhaut / #MarinaBay and #PayaLebar.
[CCL] : Additional 30mins train travel time between #DhobyGhaut / #MarinaBay and #PayaLebar due to a signal fault. Free Regular Bus is available between #DhobyGhaut / #MarinaBay and #PayaLebar
